#summary Use case for handling the removal of a book from the shopping cart.
#labels Phase-Requirements,UseCase

= Introduction =

*Description:*

A user wants to remove a book from his/her shopping cart.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user has a registered and active bookstore account.
 # The user is logged in.
 # The user has a book added to hisshopping cart.
 # The user is viewing his shopping cart.

*Postconditions:*
 # The book will no longer be in the user's shopping cart.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # User wants to remove a book from his shopping cart.
 # User clicks on the Remove Book button next to the book he wishes to remove.
 # The system displays a confirmation that the user wants to remove the book from his cart.
 # User accepts.
 # The system removes the book from the user's cart.
 # The system displays a message to the user that the book has been removed from the cart.
 # Use case ends.
